resources.string: Use safe client to ensure HTTPS integrity and migrate to HTTPS if possible.
Failed to fetch the information due to network error
Failed to parse the bbs information.
Successfully added a forum to database.
Upgrade to the safer HTTPS protocol.
Automatically download attachments for incoming messages.
Only download attachments when manually requested.
A safe HTTPS client will protect your privacy and data\'s integrity.
The client will not authorize the integrity of networking and your data may leak in transition.

string-array.name: string_dark_mode_night_shift
string-array.item: Dark mode in battery saving one

resources.string: Base URL means the basic url where one forum may serve.
Set HTTP protocol and it\'s not safe.
Image and attachments are not downloaded under mobile condition.
Image and attachments will be downloaded automactically.

Since the register process is not provided by the official and many websites always have their own register method which may requires different information. The app avoids the imcompatibility and will guide you to the register website. You can register your account in broswer.
No Discuz! forum found in database. Add a forum by the float button below if you like.
The data is processing with database or the server.
Task is cancelled and no change is made.
Allow sync and notification can be received.
Sync is not opened and you may miss notification.
You are banned to browse the API.

string-array.name: entry_security_answer
string-array.item: Security Answer (ignore if you do not set it)
The city where your grandfather is born
The type of your personal computer
The name of your favorite restaurant
The last 4 digits of the driver license

resources.string: The HTTP protocol or HTTPS client settings may not secure. Your account information may leak in submiting data.
Username or password is not correct.
Can\'t upload pictures now for some reasons.
Insert a picture for the post
Can not fetch the user information and login failed.
If the bbs has their own authentication in logining or you want to use 3rd-party login method, please login in webpage.
Please finish all the login process in the webpage interface then press \"login finished\" to save the successful result to app.
No friend is made in the bbs and consider adding one?
The app will use OKHTTP user agent to identify the client. Device\'s information will not leak and some servers may block your unusual request.
The app will simulate the browsing websites and the User-Agent(UA) we sent is given below:
The app will not sync information with server from 11.00 PM to 08.00 AM.
The app will sync with server at night and may disturb you.
No user found in the bbs.
Due to privacy protection, the page is not shown in detail.
The app will backup your post in local draft box while posting a thread.
Your post will not backup while posting a thread.
The app will automatically backup your thread.
You need to press draft icon to save your thread.
You will delete all the drafts under bbs(%1$s). The operation can\'t rollback and all your infomation will loss.
It will notify your account\'s updates in bbs.
Failed to fetch the %2$s\'s information in %1$s
The %1$s\'s post has been copied to clipboard.
Can not get clipboard manager services.
Download attachment and you can see it in notification bar.
Can not download the attachment due to the null of download manager services.
DiscuzHub is an unofficial app for Discuz! bbs and released with MIT licence.
User %1$s is expired. You should relogin to activate it.
You need to agree with our terms of use and privacy policy to use DiscuzHub.
Vibrate when all threads are loaded.
The forum doesn\'t have a description.
The forum doesn\'t describe its rules.
Initializing is not completed and please wait.
Can\'t vibrate since vibrator is not found.
Failed to retrieve file from your selection.
The attachment is too large to accept by the server.
Your group can\'t upload such a large file.
The attachment is larger than the extension limit.
You can\'t upload any attachment today.
You can\'t upload such a big file today.
The read permission is %1$d and your credit is %2$d
You can\'t see the thread(read permission : %1$d) in igconitive mode
The post is censored and revised in case of extra credits.
The post is send via mobile phone.
The reply can only be seen by poster and administrator.
You may get reward if you post at certain number.
The post is revised and edited to prevent duplicate credits.
The item is only visible to the friends.
Contribute to bbs to get a medal.
We are preparing the profile details…
Your group has not been assembled yet. Try later?
Due to user\'s privacy settings, you can\'t see the friend page.
No public message is received. Just keep updated.
You haven\'t gotten a call. That\'s quiet.
The bbs haven\'t recommended a thread. Check out later?
You are browsing the bbs without a user account.
Sort, delete and manage current bbs collection.
Add an account by password or webpage.
Sort, manage or logout users in bbs.
No bbs is currently added, please add a bbs pressing left drawer.
Swipe left or right on a bbs to delete it.
Long press then drag it up or down to resort bbs.
Swipe item to line start to relogin the user.
Swipe right to line end to delete the user.
Long press then drag it up or down to resort users.
Your view on forum, thread, post will be recorded locally.
Your view history will not be recorded.
View history is not opened and no history is found.
All view histories in the bbs will be wiped out and this operation is irrevocable. Are you sure to delete them?
All view histories has been wiped out.
Hi, we just found that you don\'t want your view to be recorded. You can clear all history records in the database and it\\\'s irrecoverable. Do you want to do it now?
Replying content can\'t be saved to database. We will support soon.
You can\'t set a password when posting a reply.
Outlink \"%1$s\" is different from current bbs \"%2$s\". Please be careful.
Sharing is not prepared, please wait until content is loaded.
No hot forum is currently provided. Check out later?
We have received the response but got false hot forum content.
Favoriting or unfavoriting the thread is not prepared. Please wait util the thread is loaded.
Start to sync favorite thread from %1$s.
Set a description for the favorite
Start to sync favorite forums from %1$s.
Sync favorite threads and forums from server
Only retrieve favorite threads and forums from database
All new messages from sign-in user in %1$s will be notified.
Recv %1$d new messages and total %2$d ones.
It may improve the performance slightly. It is recommended to turn on in low-memory devices.
The max lines of forum rules will be set to 5. But you still can click the text to expand it.
The forum rule will be originally displayed. Click the text to collapse it.
User %1$s verified successfully but no bbs(base url:%2$s) found in database.
You are logining via QQ. Once you authorize the account in QQ/TIM, please select DiscuzHub in selecting dialog to login via QQ number.
App will clear over-much view history when device is idle.
All view histories will store and may possibly make app run slow.
Get a response from server but it can\'t be parsed.(%1$s)
Has load all %1$d threads in the forum.
Are you sure to buy the thread from%1$s in *%2$s* %3$s. Your remain balance will be %4$s %3$s?
Exact reason is needed when you specify report reason as others.
Null message got, the operation would not be finished.
We could not find an active network interface. Turn off flight mode or turn on wifi, celluar and bluetooth network.
You have payed for the file.
You will download the file from a remote server, please take care!
Those items have been successfully loaded.
Enable list animation and it may freeze the interface.
Disable list animation, it may improve app\'s performance in low-profile devices.

resources.string: No users signed in. Incognitive mode enabled.
Please comply with Discuz Hub DIY policy and don\'t use application id: \"com.kidozh.discuzhub\". Tap to get the reason and solution.
Checking %1$s information from Discuz mobile API. It may takes upmost 5 seconds.
%1$s passed Discuz! mobile API test and is compatible with the APP.
I agree to $1%s\'s term of use
I understand this app is powered by DiscuzHub and agree to DiscuzHub\'s term of use and privacy policy.
Use HTTP is insecure and your data(especially password) may be hijacked. Contact %1$s\'s administrator to use HTTPS protocol if possible!
Package name is conflicted with DiscuzHub and the app can\'t add bbs now!
API 5 allows you to use further service with discuz X
You can interact with Discuz X with API 4 service. The service is stable and comes with basis operations.
This indicates the version of Discuz X.
Every extended function run on Discuz plugin. Newer plugin enables better performance and security.
It is the official name of the BBS and will be saved in final database.
UTF-8 is used and support most languages.
GBK is used in simplified Chinese charset. Using other kinds of languages will make chars garbled.
BIG-5 is used in tranditional Chinese. Using other kinds of languages will make chars garbled.
Mobile module is equipped with registration, but it may not configures correctly.
This site allows login and registration by QQ.
This site has %1$s members and %2$s posts.
Login parameters is not ready, please wait and try later.
You are browsing the %1$s without registing an account. Some functionality will be disabled until you sign in.
Search threads or other stuff here.
We know that some discuz! forums enable PWA approach and it may stop webview from loading url. If the page can\'t navigate to proper inner page, please use PC versioned page!
The page may not navigate automatically
Get an unexpected result, the api may not work properly.
Swipe down to get the next page.
App will automatically remove jammer contents in a post.
When you see the jammer characters, you can try to open it.
Content is not loaded, please wait until you could see it.
You just input a over-sized number(max:%1$d).
